PrecisAppointments of KPMG LLP, Chartered Accountants, of Toronto, Ontario, and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditors of the Canada Post Corporation and its subsidiaries, Purolator Inc., Innovapost Inc. and SCI Group Inc., for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2016.
